columns.name: name
columns.description: The resource name.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The resource identifier.

columns.name: friendly_name
columns.description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device name.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type.

columns.name: data_box_edge_device_status
columns.description: The status of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device. Possible values include: 'ReadyToSetup', 'Online', 'Offline', 'NeedsAttention', 'Disconnected', 'PartiallyDisconnected', 'Maintenance'.

columns.name: culture
columns.description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device culture.

columns.name: description
columns.description: he Description of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

columns.name: device_model
columns.description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device model.

columns.name: device_type
columns.description: The type of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device. Possible values include: 'DataBoxEdgeDevice'.

columns.name: device_hcs_version
columns.description: The device software version number of the device (eg: 1.2.18105.6).

columns.name: device_local_capacity
columns.description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device local capacity in MB.

columns.name: device_software_version
columns.description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device software version.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: The etag for the devices.

columns.name: location
columns.description: The location of the device. This is a supported and registered Azure geographical region (for example, West US, East US, or Southeast Asia). The geographical region of a device cannot be changed once it is created, but if an identical geographical region is specified on update, the request will succeed.

columns.name: model_description
columns.description: The description of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device model.

columns.name: node_count
columns.description: The number of nodes in the cluster.

columns.name: serial_number
columns.description: The Serial Number of Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: SKU name of the resource. Possible values include: 'Gateway', 'Edge'.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: The SKU tier. This is based on the SKU name. Possible values include: 'Standard'.

columns.name: time_zone
columns.description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device timezone.

columns.name: configured_role_types
columns.description: Type of compute roles configured.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
